title: Public enemy number one
brief_description: Wilfred Burchett is Australia’s most controversial journalist. He has always been first on the spot, first with a good story, from Hiroshima to Hanoi. But his activities attracted the disfavour of the Australian Government and he was exiled from his own country for 17 years. Rated: G
